00036  * lnet/selftest/conctl.c
00037  *
00038  * Test client & Server
00039  *
00040  * Author: Liang Zhen <liangzhen@clusterfs.com>

00042 
00043 #include "selftest.h"
00044 
00045 #define LST_PING_TEST_MAGIC     0xbabeface
00046 
00047 static int ping_srv_workitems = SFW_TEST_WI_MAX;
00048 module_param(ping_srv_workitems, int, 0644);
00049 MODULE_PARM_DESC(ping_srv_workitems, "# PING server workitems");
00050 
00051 typedef struct {
00052         spinlock_t      pnd_lock;       /* serialize */
00053         int             pnd_counter;    /* sequence counter */
00054 } lst_ping_data_t;
00055 
00056 static lst_ping_data_t  lst_ping_data;
00057 
00058 static int
00059 ping_client_init(sfw_test_instance_t *tsi)
00060 {
00061         sfw_session_t *sn = tsi->tsi_batch->bat_session;
00062 
00063         LASSERT(tsi->tsi_is_client);
00064         LASSERT(sn != NULL && (sn->sn_features & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) == 0);
00065 
00066         spin_lock_init(&lst_ping_data.pnd_lock);
00067         lst_ping_data.pnd_counter = 0;
00068 
00069         return 0;
00070 }
00071 
00072 static void
00073 ping_client_fini (sfw_test_instance_t *tsi)
00074 {
00075         sfw_session_t *sn = tsi->tsi_batch->bat_session;
00076         int            errors;
00077 
00078         LASSERT (sn != NULL);
00079         LASSERT (tsi->tsi_is_client);
00080 
00081         errors = atomic_read(&sn->sn_ping_errors);
00082         if (errors)
00083                 CWARN ("%d pings have failed.\n", errors);
00084         else
00085                 CDEBUG (D_NET, "Ping test finished OK.\n");
00086 }
00087 
00088 static int
00089 ping_client_prep_rpc(sfw_test_unit_t *tsu,
00090                      lnet_process_id_t dest, srpc_client_rpc_t **rpc)
00091 {
00092         srpc_ping_reqst_t   *req;
00093         sfw_test_instance_t *tsi = tsu->tsu_instance;
00094         sfw_session_t       *sn  = tsi->tsi_batch->bat_session;
00095         struct timeval       tv;
00096         int                  rc;
00097 
00098         LASSERT(sn != NULL);
00099         LASSERT((sn->sn_features & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) == 0);
00100 
00101         rc = sfw_create_test_rpc(tsu, dest, sn->sn_features, 0, 0, rpc);
00102         if (rc != 0)
00103                 return rc;
00104 
00105         req = &(*rpc)->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.ping_reqst;
00106 
00107         req->pnr_magic = LST_PING_TEST_MAGIC;
00108 
00109         spin_lock(&lst_ping_data.pnd_lock);
00110         req->pnr_seq = lst_ping_data.pnd_counter++;
00111         spin_unlock(&lst_ping_data.pnd_lock);
00112 
00113         cfs_fs_timeval(&tv);
00114         req->pnr_time_sec  = tv.tv_sec;
00115         req->pnr_time_usec = tv.tv_usec;
00116 
00117         return rc;
00118 }
00119 
00120 static void
00121 ping_client_done_rpc (sfw_test_unit_t *tsu, srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
00122 {
00123         sfw_test_instance_t *tsi = tsu->tsu_instance;
00124         sfw_session_t       *sn = tsi->tsi_batch->bat_session;
00125         srpc_ping_reqst_t   *reqst = &rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.ping_reqst;
00126         srpc_ping_reply_t   *reply = &rpc->crpc_replymsg.msg_body.ping_reply;
00127         struct timeval       tv;
00128 
00129         LASSERT (sn != NULL);
00130 
00131         if (rpc->crpc_status != 0) {
00132                 if (!tsi->tsi_stopping) /* rpc could have been aborted */
00133                         atomic_inc(&sn->sn_ping_errors);
00134                 CERROR ("Unable to ping %s (%d): %d\n",
00135                         libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest),
00136                         reqst->pnr_seq, rpc->crpc_status);
00137                 return;
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (rpc->crpc_replymsg.msg_magic != SRPC_MSG_MAGIC) {
00141                 __swab32s(&reply->pnr_seq);
00142                 __swab32s(&reply->pnr_magic);
00143                 __swab32s(&reply->pnr_status);
00144         }
00145 
00146         if (reply->pnr_magic != LST_PING_TEST_MAGIC) {
00147                 rpc->crpc_status = -EBADMSG;
00148                 atomic_inc(&sn->sn_ping_errors);
00149                 CERROR ("Bad magic %u from %s, %u expected.\n",
00150                         reply->pnr_magic, libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest),
00151                         LST_PING_TEST_MAGIC);
00152                 return;
00153         }
00154 
00155         if (reply->pnr_seq != reqst->pnr_seq) {
00156                 rpc->crpc_status = -EBADMSG;
00157                 atomic_inc(&sn->sn_ping_errors);
00158                 CERROR ("Bad seq %u from %s, %u expected.\n",
00159                         reply->pnr_seq, libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest),
00160                         reqst->pnr_seq);
00161                 return;
00162         }
00163 
00164         cfs_fs_timeval(&tv);
00165         CDEBUG (D_NET, "%d reply in %u usec\n", reply->pnr_seq,
00166                 (unsigned)((tv.tv_sec - (unsigned)reqst->pnr_time_sec) * 1000000
00167                            + (tv.tv_usec - reqst->pnr_time_usec)));
00168         return;
00169 }
00170 
00171 static int
00172 ping_server_handle(struct srpc_server_rpc *rpc)
00173 {
00174         struct srpc_service     *sv  = rpc->srpc_scd->scd_svc;
00175         srpc_msg_t        *reqstmsg = &rpc->srpc_reqstbuf->buf_msg;
00176         srpc_msg_t        *replymsg = &rpc->srpc_replymsg;
00177         srpc_ping_reqst_t *req = &reqstmsg->msg_body.ping_reqst;
00178         srpc_ping_reply_t *rep = &rpc->srpc_replymsg.msg_body.ping_reply;
00179 
00180         LASSERT (sv->sv_id == SRPC_SERVICE_PING);
00181 
00182         if (reqstmsg->msg_magic != SRPC_MSG_MAGIC) {
00183                 LASSERT (reqstmsg->msg_magic == __swab32(SRPC_MSG_MAGIC));
00184 
00185                 __swab32s(&req->pnr_seq);
00186                 __swab32s(&req->pnr_magic);
00187                 __swab64s(&req->pnr_time_sec);
00188                 __swab64s(&req->pnr_time_usec);
00189         }
00190         LASSERT (reqstmsg->msg_type == srpc_service2request(sv->sv_id));
00191 
00192         if (req->pnr_magic != LST_PING_TEST_MAGIC) {
00193                 CERROR ("Unexpect magic %08x from %s\n",
00194                         req->pnr_magic, libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer));
00195                 return -EINVAL;
00196         }
00197 
00198         rep->pnr_seq   = req->pnr_seq;
00199         rep->pnr_magic = LST_PING_TEST_MAGIC;
00200 
00201         if ((reqstmsg->msg_ses_feats & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) != 0) {
00202                 replymsg->msg_ses_feats = LST_FEATS_MASK;
00203                 rep->pnr_status = EPROTO;
00204                 return 0;
00205         }
00206 
00207         replymsg->msg_ses_feats = reqstmsg->msg_ses_feats;
00208 
00209         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Get ping %d from %s\n",
00210                req->pnr_seq, libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer));
00211         return 0;
00212 }
00213 
00214 sfw_test_client_ops_t ping_test_client;
00215 void ping_init_test_client(void)
00216 {
00217         ping_test_client.tso_init     = ping_client_init;
00218         ping_test_client.tso_fini     = ping_client_fini;
00219         ping_test_client.tso_prep_rpc = ping_client_prep_rpc;
00220         ping_test_client.tso_done_rpc = ping_client_done_rpc;
00221 }
00222 
00223 srpc_service_t ping_test_service;
00224 void ping_init_test_service(void)
00225 {
00226         ping_test_service.sv_id       = SRPC_SERVICE_PING;
00227         ping_test_service.sv_name     = "ping_test";
00228         ping_test_service.sv_handler  = ping_server_handle;
00229         ping_test_service.sv_wi_total = ping_srv_workitems;
00230 }
